duties: Developing new products to the company's portfolio
Developing commercial applications for big brands
Developing and maintaining new features introduced to the clients
jobList.description: This job is constantly showing me that nothing is impossible. Each day our clients come up with new ideas to promote themselves where solution often turn out as an opportunity to gain new skills not only the technical. Variety of projects running in the company gives chance to experiment with functionalities to create something unique but also allow to work in teams on long term projects for global brands

duties: Managing IT department concerning customer orders
Developing and maintaining new features introduced to the clients
jobList.description: This job position gave me opportunity for my skills to thrive, from the beggining I've served over 400 ecommerce websites with custom designs and new functionalities.

jobList.position: Customer Success Specialist/ Customer Onboarding Specialist
duties: Developing and testing new onboarding strategies with usage of Intercom, Hubspot and other engagement applications
Developing strategies concerning internal team flow
Processing data for department's internal statistics
jobList.description: During holding this position I was responsible for creating internal onboarding flow and increasing conversion into subscription plan. During this time me and my team have increased conversion to 25% of lead base and also created core base of the onboarding processes and internal client lifecycle flow.

duties: Preparing English translations of various scientific works (in partnership with Military University of Technology in Warsaw)
jobList.description: During this time I was practicing my academic knowledge. Whilist performing private English lessons I was cooperating with Military University of Technology in Warsaw with translations of their students' BE thesis and other publications. Additionally, I was helping foreigners with business meetings or visits in institutions.

projects.name: Loveys
projects.description: This is an online store with handmade toys and accesories for toddlers and newborns. It has been created because my wife is very talented and we wanted to monetize a little on it.
